SceneDescription.name: Laundry Chute
SceneDescription.description: A small laundry chute drops clothing into a large basket.

condition.additionalDescription: Assassin: I think I could make it up the chute with this climbing gear.

action.description: It takes a fair amount of work, but you manage to to make it up the laundry chute

condition.additionalDescription: Assassin: I'm pretty sure I can't climb up the chute. I'm an assassin, not a ninja!

action.description: Assassin: Yeah, I'm not doing that.
